sentences.sContent: One who acts as a decoy, as in a confidence game.
sentences.sContent_eng: One who acts as a decoy, as in a confidence game.
sentences.sCn: 诱骗者，赌棍同伙充当眼线的人，如在一场骗局中。

sentences.sContent: The girls decoy more easily than most other children.
sentences.sContent_eng: The girls decoy more easily than most other children.
sentences.sCn: 这些女孩比其他大多数孩子们更容易被诱骗。

sentences.sContent: Nick acted as a decoy after the dog attacked a group of children swimming in the river.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nick acted as a decoy after the dog attacked a group of children swimming in the river.
sentences.sCn: 那只狗攻击了在河里游泳的一群孩子后，尼克作诱饵要将其捉住。
